description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 12/08/2005

Felicia remains silent while Nick argues with Stephanie.  Eric and Brooke’s plan create shockwaves with Taylor, Thorne, and Darla.  Taylor calls Stephanie to inform her of the situation and for the moment it appears that Eric’s plan is working.
